Review Text: Nice ambience with very clean environment. Though we were stopped at the gate, found out its a routine security verification thing - which we totally understand and appreciate. (Safety first) The front receptionist were warm and professional. There is awareness for covid-19 and protocols were being followed. The staff were courteous, very cheerful and willing to assist at all time. Love the decor from the lobby to the room. The rooms are beautiful, yet cozy apartments with kitchenettes. Also enjoyed the food as they offer a blend of Nigeria and continental dishes and of course I always look forward to the breakfast spread.  We would surely return and as well recommend to my friends always. Such an amazing place to be. Please keep it up.

Spent almost 2 weeks in this hotel . The staff are very polite, respectful , welcoming and hardworking . The room service is very nice and there is a lovely breakfast buffet too . The rooms are spacious and modern. It’s in a very secured area and I can’t wait to visit again !

In the Heart of lagos when everything is busy around, located in a very good and secure spot.  The Hotel looks brand new, rooms are big equiped with nice kitchen and big bed, nice swimming pool & graet restaurant.  The stuff is friendly and helpfull, happy to serve and always with a big smile.  Recommended for business trips and for cuples.
